title: endhuki chalamu
sahitya:
endukI calamu nEnevaritO delpudu



anupallavi



kandarpa janaka nIkEkAnta jeppEnO hari hari



caraNam 1



kausalya ceppEnO nIkE sammati lEdO ahalya ceppEnO

nannAdarinca lEvO



caraNam 2



kabar  bhArini sItA kAnta jeppEnO lEka shabari jeppEno n du

shAntamendu pOyE



caraNam 3



bAlayau svayamprabha jeppEnO tALa nA taramA shrI

tyAgarAjun pai nIk-
